cement.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a grey powder made from lime and clay that becomes hard when it is mixed with water and allowed to dry, and that is used in building
cement.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a thick sticky substance that becomes very hard when it dries and is used for filling holes or sticking things together
cement.translation[1].definitions[1].def: to make a relationship between people, countries, or organizations firm and strong
cement.translation[1].definitions[1].exa: They want to cement a good working relationship between the government and trade unions.
